data SnapShotStats = SnapShotStats {
  • sssStake ∷ !(Stat (Credential 'Staking))
  • sssDelegationCredential ∷ !(Stat (Credential 'Staking))
  • sssDelegationStakePool ∷ !(Stat (KeyHash 'StakePool))

}
